channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shares of drone maker Unusual Machines soar more than 90% after Donald Trump Jr. joins advisory board
item.description: Donald Trump Jr., the son of President-elect Donald Trump, said "the need for drones is obvious" as he joined the advisory board of Unusual Machines.

item.title: Stocks tread water in light trading ahead of Thanksgiving holiday: Live updates
item.description: Traders looked ahead to a key inflation reading due Wednesday morning.

item.title: Inflation rate climbs for the first time since the summer. Fed weighs how much to cut rates.
item.description: The rate of inflation rose in October and moved further away from the Federal Reserveâ€™s 2% goal, confirming a recent uptick in prices that could cajole the central bank into cutting interest rates less aggressively.

item.title: Fedâ€™s preferred inflation gauge rises to 2.3% annually, meeting expectations
item.description: The personal consumption expenditures price index was expected to show inflation at 2.3% in October.

item.title: Treasury yields trim declines after PCE inflation reading edges up from Fedâ€™s target
item.description: Treasury yields were trimming earlier declines after a barrage of pre-Thanksgiving economic data added to the case for gradual Fed rate cuts .

item.title: OpenAI gets new $1.5 billion investment from SoftBank, allowing employees to sell shares in a tender offer
item.description: OpenAI on Tuesday introduced a new $1.5 billion tender offer, a continuation of its recent $6.6 billion funding round, led by SoftBank, CNBC has learned.

item.title: European markets subdued amid tariff threat; Aston Martin shares down 5% after profit warning
item.description: European markets traded lower Wednesday as investors continued to assess the potential impact of President-elect Donald Trump's plans to hike tariffs.

item.title: Consumer spending climbs ahead of holidays. Households far from tapped out.
item.description: Consumer spending rose at a healthy pace in October and fueled a U.S. economic expansion that shows no sign of slowing in the waning months of 2024.

item.title: Homebuyer demand for mortgages jumps 12% after first interest rate drop in over 2 months
item.description: While the drop in rates wasn't exactly huge, there was a fair amount of pent-up demand among homebuyers.

item.title: Generative AI's hype has yet to lead to a must-have gadget for the holiday season
item.description: Meta, Rabbit and Bee AI are offering Black Friday deals for their devices that incorporate AI, but there aren't many other generative AI gadgets on the market.

item.title: 'Moana 2'-led Thanksgiving box office could be best in post-pandemic era
item.description: The trifecta of "Moana 2," "Wicked" and "Gladiator II" could make this year's Thanksgiving box office the best in years.
